name: skillswap-platform
description: Skill Swap Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:3000: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm start"
scripts.dev:3001: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && PORT=3001 npm start"
scripts.dev:3002: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && PORT=3002 npm start"
scripts.dev:3003: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && PORT=3003 npm start"
scripts.dev:3004: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && PORT=3004 npm start"
scripts.dev:3005: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && PORT=3005 npm start"
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: SkillSwap Team
